WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 31 JUL
   BY M/V VANTAGE TOWING SIX 155 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-44.15S 042-44.77W, 24-40.25S 042-46.85W,
   24-27.55S 042-18.40W, 24-31.32S 042-16.27W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2161/19.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 01 AUG 19.
